## PoiStackMode enum

Define the stacking option. Enum values for theme file are in "kebab-case".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum PoiStackMode 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Hide | <code>&quot;hide-in-stack&quot;</code> | Do not show in a stack. |
|  Show | <code>&quot;show-in-stack&quot;</code> | Show in a stack. |
|  ShowParent | <code>&quot;show-parent&quot;</code> | Show category parent in the stack. |
